content:
Linping YUAN (袁林萍) is currently a Ph.D. student in HKUST VisLab , at the Department of Computer Science and Engineering, Hong Kong University of Science and Technology , under the supervision of Prof. Huamin Qu . Before that, she obtained her B.Eng. degree from Xi’an Jiaotong University majoring in Software Engineering in 2019.
Her research interests mainly lie in automatic visualization generation and recommendation.

title: Linping YUAN
SpeechLens: A Visual Analytics Approach for Exploring Speech Strategies with Textural and Acoustic Features
